heading: HR00486
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO STRONGLY CONDEMN THE VIOLENT DISPERSAL OF THE DEMONSTRATION OF PATRIOTIC ORGANIZATIONS LED BY NATIONAL MINORITY GROUPS IN FRONT OF THE US EMBASSY IN MANILA, AND CALLING ON THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT A PROBE ON THE INCIDENT AND SUMMON TO CONGRESS THE PERPETRATORS BEHIND IT, ESPECIALLY PO3 FRANKLIN KHO AND SR. SUPT. MARCELINO PEDROZO, DEPUTY DIRECTOR FOR OPERATIONS OF THE MANILA POLICE DISTRICT
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00486
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO STRONGLY CONDEMN THE VIOLENT DISPERSAL OF THE DEMONSTRATION OF PATRIOTIC ORGANIZATIONS LED BY NATIONAL MINORITY GROUPS IN FRONT OF THE US EMBASSY IN MANILA, AND CALLING ON THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT A PROBE ON THE INCIDENT AND SUMMON TO CONGRESS THE PERPETRATORS BEHIND IT, ESPECIALLY PO3 FRANKLIN KHO AND SR. SUPT. MARCELINO PEDROZO, DEPUTY DIRECTOR FOR OPERATIONS OF THE MANILA POLICE DISTRICT
